com.marklogic.mgmt.cpf

Class AbstractCpfResourceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.marklogic.client.helper.LoggingObject
      • com.marklogic.mgmt.AbstractManager
        • com.marklogic.mgmt.cpf.AbstractCpfResourceManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CpfConfigManager, DomainManager, PipelineManager

    public abstract class AbstractCpfResourceManager
extends AbstractManager
    Can't extend AbstractResourceManager because the URLs for CPF resources require a database ID.
